data.title: Welcome Home to Windflower in Heber City, UT
data.meta_description: Nestled in the valley of the beautiful Wasatch Mountains, surrounded by breathtaking views — Windflower in Heber City, Utah is your chance to get away from it all. data.text:
Nestled in the valley of the beautiful Wasatch Mountains, surrounded by breathtaking views — Windflower in Heber City, Utah is your chance to get away from it all. Located in the Wasatch County School District, this scenic community is convenient to shopping, restaurants, recreation — everything you need to live a perfectly balanced lifestyle.

With four floorplans ranging from 2-4 bedrooms and up to 3,223 square feet of generous living space, there is a home at Windflower for you. Homes are modern and spacious, yet warm and inviting, with the open rooms flowing freely from one to the other. With stylish features like gourmet kitchens with large walk-in pantries, great rooms with optional fireplaces, spectacular owners suites with walk-in closets, tiled showers, and soaking tubs — plus beautiful fixtures and finishes — your home will feel like your very own luxury resort.

With just 45 homesites planned for both phases of Windflower, now is the opportunity to reserve yours. Join the interest list for the next home that will be complete in the next few months, and you can join the close-knit community of Windflower neighbors by the New Year!

About Heber City and Wasatch County

Heber City and Wasatch Country, where Windflower is located, have seen tremendous growth in the last decade. The county was the 7th fastest-growing in the entire nation in [2020], and it’s easy to see why. There are so many unique and exciting things to do in the Heber Valley — from world-renowned skiing to golfing against breathtaking mountain backdrops to celebrating Utah’s Swiss heritage — it’s easy to love everyday life here. In Heber City alone, the population has grown 29% over the last decade.
